definitions.definition: to talk to someone in a friendly informal way:
examples: She spends hours on the phone chatting to her friends.

definitions.definition: to take part in a discussion that involves sending messages over the internet, by smartphone, etc.:
examples: Use the app to chat and send photos free from anywhere in the world.
Why don't you give me a call and we'll have a chat?

definitions.definition: a discussion that involves sending messages over the internet, by phone, using a messaging service, etc.:
examples: How do I start a group chat?
